This project will show an example chi-squared analysis on example data testing for any association between maximum education level and salary.

***Loading Packages***
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(gridExtra)
library(tidyr)
```

## Creating a data set
```{r}
Education_Level = c(rep("GED",15), rep("Undergraduate",35), rep("Graduate",50))
Salary = c(rep("Under 75K",15), rep("Over 75K",35), rep("Over 75K",50))
df = data.frame(Education_Level, Salary)
dftable <- table(df)
```
